titleStmt.title: A Full and true relation of dreadful and terrible storm, that hapned [sic] at Forte St. George, in the East-Indies, on the 3d of November, 1684. Communicated in a letter to a friend in London, from one belonging to the English factory.
titleStmt.author: R. L. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Croom, at the sign of the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, over against Baynard's-Castle.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
